doctor.name: Dr. Omar Faroque Bhuiyan
doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Spine) Specialist & Trauma Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Omar Faroque Bhuiyan is a skilled orthopedics specialist and trauma surgeon in Cumilla, with expertise in treating bone, joint, and spine-related conditions. He holds an MBBS and a Diploma in Orthopedics (D-ORTHO), and currently serves as a consultant in orthopedic surgery at Cumilla Medical Center (Pvt.) Ltd. Dr. Bhuiyan provides expert care for fractures, arthritis, back pain, slipped discs, joint dislocations, sports injuries, and spinal disorders. His precise diagnostic approach and patient-focused treatment make him a trusted choice for both surgical and non-surgical orthopedic care. He is available for consultations at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital), Room #662, Bhaban-2, Comilla Tower, Laksam Road, Cumilla, every day from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM and 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM. Patients seeking reliable orthopedic care in Cumilla regularly turn to Dr. Bhuiyan for his experience and dedication.

chamber.hospital: Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital)
chamber.address: Room # 662, Bhaban-2, Comilla Tower, Laksam Road, Cumilla
